CatDescriptText: Mrs. Anna Mae Tot, 1227 Warner Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 14, 1958, pg. 8 with question: �Do you think ministers should invest in business enterprises for profit, or become executives or directors of such concern?� answer reads: "No, I don't. I think that a minister should stick to the ministry."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Anna Mae Tot wearing paisley short sleeved dress, standing across from the Stanley Theatre, Penn Avenue, Downtown
